channel.title: Examples on Be Fit, Move, Exercise, Workout

item.title: Datalist
item.description: Data list example Iterate in data in the .md file is not possible. Iterate in a shortcode: All gone with the wind, year 1939 Planet of the Apes, year 1968 Chitty Chitty Bang Bang, year 1968 Iterate in data where shortcode parameter Start: Planet of the Apes, year 1968 Iterate in data where shortcode parameter from frontmatter Start: All gone with the wind, year 1939 Chitty Chitty Bang Bang, year 1968 Done.
